artist: Artist: Sonia Pulido , et al.; Editor: Luan Mart; Publisher: Ediciones Mono Grafico, Burgos, Spain
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: No. 187 of Mono Grafico, a satirical Spanish periodical zine. Photographic portraits of clowns with letterpress text printed in color offset lithography on newsprint; saddle stitched binding, 30 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Mono Grafico: 28 Aniversario
